author: Jonah Blocker
title: Dr. Nicole Saphier: Keeping Our Healthcare System Strong
description: This week, Shannon is joined by Dr. Nicole Saphier to discuss COVID-19 and what experts are learning about it, innovative uses of existing medications to try to fight the virus, and more.
content:
Shannon Bream, host of FOX News @ Night on the FOX News Channel returns with a new "Livin' the Bream" podcast.
This week, Shannon sits down with Dr. Nicole Saphier, physician, FOX News contributor and author of "Make America Healthy Again". They discuss how … [+305 chars]
